channel.title: Deep Beneath the Cover of Another Perfect Wonder
channel.description:
I heard this old story before Where the people keep on killing for their metaphors But don't leave much up to the imagination, So I, wanna give this imagery back But I know it just ain’t so easy like that So I turn the page and read the story again and again and again It sure seems the same, with a different name We're breaking and rebuilding and we're growing always guessing
[img]http://img65.imageshack.us/img65/8672/protea1bm3.jpg[/img]
Never knowing We're shocking but we're nothing We're just moments, we're Clever but we're clueless We're just human, amusing and confusing Were trying but where is this all leading? We'll Never Know
(Jack Johnson ~Never Know~ In Dreams)

item.title: Deep Beneath the Cover of Another Perfect Wonder
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Lol, did you donate blood or something?

No. That shits a scam anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Deep Beneath the Cover of Another Perfect Wonder
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:10, topic:42417”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=59248.msg721974#msg721974 date=1167714955]

I’m high on life at the moment. Amazing stuff really, if you know the right dose.

Will my local headshop sell this?
[/quote]

You have to buy it with blood.[/quote]

Lol, did you donate blood or something?

My dad did it once, but he didn’t seem “woozy” at all, but when my friends parents did they were acting like they were drunk.

Read full topic

item.title: Deep Beneath the Cover of Another Perfect Wonder
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I heard this old story before
Where the people keep on killing for their metaphors
But don’t leave much up to the imagination,
So I, wanna give this imagery back
But I know it just ain’t so easy like that
So I turn the page and read the story again
and again and again
It sure seems the same, with a different name
We’re breaking and rebuilding
and we’re growing
always guessing

Never knowing
We’re shocking but we’re nothing
We’re just moments, we’re Clever but we’re clueless
We’re just human, amusing and confusing
Were trying but where is this all leading?
We’ll Never Know

(Jack Johnson ~Never Know~ In Dreams)

Read full topic
